name: Project Control and Assurance Plan (update) test
description: Review any leftovers from the previous phase, deliverables for this phase, and upcoming deliveries.

next.name: Emergency Response Plans and Bridging Documents

name: Contracts QUILT
description:
Establish;
Contract duration and re-tender timelines
Technical and purchasing contact for Neptune and Service company
Value and risk per Contract
Contract performance review process
HSE performance per Contract

next.name: Long Lead Equipment AFE internal review and approval

name: Major Service/Equipment Contracts
description:
Issue letter of award for major service/equipment providers (post sanction - FID or corporate contracts), including:

Tubulars
Well Head/Xmas Tree
Directional Drilling and MWD/LWD
Cementing
Drilling Fluids and Waste Management
Wireline Logging
Completions
Well Test
Logistics (Helicopters, Supply vessels, standby vessel, onshore logistics base, onshore helicopter base, road transport, waste management, weather forecast).

name: Establish Contract Incentive Scheme (Class 2 -> AFE)
description: Establish front end contract incentive scheme (Class 2 -> AFE)

next.name: Ship Collision Study Report / Vessel Traffic Evaluation Report

name: Long Lead Equipment AFE internal review and approval
description: Define Long Lead equipment requirements for the well/project (wellhead, conductor, casing, liner hangers, Xmas tree, completion etc.) perform peer review and submit Long Lead Equipment AFE for internal approval.

next.name: Rig Acceptance Test and Rig Verification

name: Long Lead Equipment AFE JV partnership approval
description:
Key deliverable for Detailed Engineering stage.
Obtain JV Partnership approval of Long Lead Equipment AFE (JV TCM Project Sanction) coordinated by the Project Manager

name: Wellbore Registration Document to NPD (OD)
description: Register well with NPD, and establish well identification number (min. 14days before spud)

name: Detailed SIMOPS Assessment
description:
Conduct detailed SIMOPS Assessment with multi-discipline team.
The level of simultaneous operations in this assessment is between the rig, vessel, facilities, etc operating within the immediate area of the well or project.
End result could be a signed off Project Specific Matrix of Permittable Operation (MOPO)

name: Ship Collision Study Report / Vessel Traffic Evaluation Report
description: Identify risks of ship collision and location vessel traffic

next.name: Long Lead Equipment AFE internal review and approval

name: Site Specific Emergency Preparedness Assessment SSEPA
description: Conduct detailed risk assessment (HAZID) with multi-discipline team.

name: Site Specific Risk Assessment SSRA
description: Conduct detailed risk assessment (HAZID) with multi-discipline team.

name: Well Specific Risk Assessment WSRA
description: Conduct detailed risk assessment (HAZID) with multi-discipline team.

name: HSEQ Management Plan
description:
Departmental and rig specific HSEQ management plan for the well/project.
- Align with company HSEQ priorities
- Align with departmental HSEQ priorities
- Align with Major contractors HSEQ priorities
- Outlines expectations, audit schedules, targets and KPIs

name: Emergency Response Plans and Bridging Documents
description:
Risk Description
Bridging document
Risk Management
Emergency Response Resources
Contingency plans
Competencies, training and drill
Communication Protocols

name: Emergency Response Table Top Exercise
description:
Full run through of a 3rd Line Emergency Scenario
- Test interfaces
- Test response and escalation

name: Quality and Assurance Plan
description:
Outline;
Establish Non-Conformance Reporting process and register
Establish Inspection requirements and standards
Establish audit schedule
Establish KPIs

name: Waste Management Plan
description:
Define;
Competencies
Types and Volumes
Waste handling methods
Facilities

next.name: Site Specific Emergency Preparedness Assessment SSEPA

name: Plume Simulation Report
description: Identify behaviour of the HC plume in event of a blowout to identify capping feasibility, explosion risk, rig/vessel risks etc.

name: Well Control Contingency Plan
description:
The Well Control Contingency Plan provides strategy guidelines without specific well or site information, to;
Minimize the response time
Link the main response plans in a detailed document in order to have immediate action in all well
control situations 
Establish the well containment plan to regain well control ( well kill, well capping and relief well)
Have clear organization chart for activities

name: Source Control Emergency Response Plan (SCERP) - Capping Plan
description:
Departmental source control emergency response plan (capping plan) covering;
Organizational aspects
Technical capping equipment aspects 
Technical interface aspects
Mobilization aspects

The plan is intended to be functional for the relevant wells scope at all times and is to be complemented with the well specific relief well program on a well by well basis

name: Relief Well Program
description: Develop well specific conceptual relief well program

assurance.name: SME Directional Drilling and Survey Management
SME Rig intake and Rig projects

name: Oil Spill Contingency Plan
description: Develop Oil Spill Plan and  Beredskapsanalyse

name: Wells Cost Estimate Class 3 / AFE Internal review and approval
description: Generate AFE quality (+/-10%) cost estimate. If significantly greater than previously approved Budgetary Cost Estimate i.e. > 10% then re-submit for approval both internally and by JV partnership

name: Wells Cost Estimate Class 3 / AFE JV partnership approval
description: Obtain JV Partnership approval of the well Wells Cost Estimate Class 3 / AFE (JV TCM Project Sanction) coordinated by the Project Manager

name: Project Cost tracking Model for AFE
description:
Define cost breakdown; Project, Well, Section, Activity, contract, etc
Define tracking levels

name: Data Acquisition Programme(s)
description:
Key deliverable for Detailed Engineering stage.
Detailed geological programme including, but not limited to:
- Well Location and water depth
- Shallow Hazards Assessment
- Lithology and Formation Tops
- Reservoir Description and Fluid PVT
- PPFG and WBS
- Temperature
- Sampling Programme
- Outline Coring Programme
- Wireline Logging Programme
- LWD Programme
- Biostratigraphy
- Section TD criteria.

name: Data Acquisition Programme Internal Peer-Review
description:
Peer review of Data Acquisition Programme.
The review team shall include Well Engineers, Drilling Superintendent, Operations Geologist, Subsurface Team Lead, Wells Manager.

name: Activity Programme(s)
description:
Key deliverable for Detailed Engineering stage.
Detailed operational programmes (Drilling and Completion etc) to include:
- Well Schematics
- Key subsurface inputs (lithology, PPFG, WBS, temperature, formation tops, etc.)
- Key Risks, Challenges and Objectives by Phase
- Well Control Requirements and Barriers by Phase
- Operational Steps and Instructions by Phase
- Critical Steps in each phase (pressure testing, LOT/FIT, etc.).
- BHA programme, Directional Programme, Fluids programme, Cement Programme, Upper/Lower Completion requirements etc.
- Criteria for executing contingency plans defined

name: Activity Programme(s) Internal Peer-Review
description: Peer review of Operational Programmes (Drilling and Completion etc.). The review team shall include Well Engineers, Drilling Superintendent, Ops Geologist, Wells Manager and relevant SMEs

name: Activity Programme(s) Internal approval
description:
Drilling
Completion
Data Acquisition
Logistics
Waste Management
Emergency Response Plans
SIMOPS programs
Acceptance criteria per section; pressure tests, inflow tests, cement heights etc.

Key deliverable for Detailed Engineering stage.
Approve, sign and distribute the final operational programmes to the team members, drilling contractor and service companies and JV partners.

Any changes to activity programmes require a MoC

assurance.name: SME Directional Drilling and Survey Management
SME Drilling, Completions and Cementing fluids

name: Well Acceptance Criteria and Program Execution Checklist (WAC/PEC) (Well Examination)
description:
Develop well specific Well Acceptance Criteria and Program Execution Checklist (WAC/PEC)  to ensure the well is planned in compliance with regulatory requirements, company policies and procedures, industry standards and codes, and that any necessary dispensation/MoC documents are in place.
Establish communication protocol, and ensure process is established to record and file Well Acceptance Criteria evidence.

name: Detailed Fluids Programme(s)
description:
Key Deliverable for Detailed Engineering Phase

Drilling fluids program (including mud loss mitigation plan)
Completion fluids program
Cement programs

assurance.name: SME Drilling, Completions and Cementing fluids

name: Application for Consent (AfC) Developed ready for review
description:
Key deliverable for Detailed Engineering Phase.
The approval of the well AfC will be based on recommendations from the peer review team that provided independent assurance for technical work and ensured consistency of application of good practices on the project.
When approved, all further planning and execution will be performed in accordance with the frame given in the AfC.

name: Application for Consent (AfC) Internal review and approval
description: Provide independent assurance for technical work and ensured consistency of application of good practices on the project

name: Application for Consent (AfC) Submittal to Ptil (PSA)
description: Submit to Ptil (PSA) minimum 9 weeks ahead of Spud

name: Application for Consent (AfC) Approved by Ptil (PSA)
description: Application for Consent (AfC) Approved by Ptil (PSA) ahead of Spud

name: Application for Discharge (AfD) Developed ready for review
description:
Key deliverable for Detailed Engineering Phase.
The approval of the well AfD will be based on recommendations from the peer review team that provided independent assurance for technical work and ensured consistency of application of good practices on the project.
When approved, all further planning and execution will be performed in accordance with the frame given in the AfD.

name: Application for Discharge (AfD) Internal review and approval
description: Provide independent assurance for technical work and ensured consistency of application of good practices on the project

name: Application for Discharge (AfD) Submittal to Miljødirektoratet (Mdir)
description: Submit to Miljødirektoratet (Mdir) minimum 15 weeks ahead of Spud

name: Application for Discharge (AfD) Approved by Miljødirektoratet (Mdir)
description: Application for Discharge (AfD) Approved by Miljødirektoratet (Mdir) ahead of Spud

name: Obtain Mandatory Pre-Spud Approvals (PLANC)
description:
Key milestone for Detailed Engineering stage.

Follow the PLANC process. Submit the necessary notifications and obtain the required pre-spud approvals, for example:

- Consent to Locate
- Consent to Drill
- Oil Pollution Emergency Plan (OPEP)
- Oil Discharge Permit 
- Notification of Well Operations (HSE Notification)
- Notification od Combined Operations
- Financial Responsibility
- EIA Direction for Chemical Permits (PONs/WONs)
- Combined Operations Bridging Documents, etc.

name: Well Specific Well Handover Certificate template
description: To be defined between the Asset team and Drilling and Wells

name: Purchase to Pay (P2P)
description:
Resources to handle PRs, Pos and Invoices in place
All PO commitments issued

name: Hole Section Guidelines
description:
Detailed operational steps and operating envelopes in accordance with activity programs
Detailed activity risks and hazards
Includes all supporting documentation, specs, and procedures for all equipment being run.
Everything stored in the Collaborative Well File

name: DOPs (80%)
description:
Detailed operational procedures in accordance with activity programs and hole section guidelines.
Detailed activity risks and hazards
Includes all supporting documentation, specs, and procedures for all equipment being run.
Everything stored in the Collaborative Well File

name: Establish well in EDM/Openwells
description:
Set up well in the Open Wells/EDM database.
Populate Openwells/EDM planning module

name: Well Duty team and roster
description:
Ensure correct composition of team
Updated phone numbers and emails
Duty handover sheets
Etc

name: Draft Master Equipment List (MEL) (must be ready prior well on paper exercises)
description: Generate Master Equipment List (MEL) for drilling, coring/logging and well test operations per operational phase. The equipment list will be generated in Excel and managed by a Materials and Logistics Coordinator. The inputs will be obtained from relevant well engineer (drilling and completion), a drilling contractor and service companies.

name: LogisticsWOP workshop
description:
Prepare and hold Logistics Well on Paper exercise involving key service companies, internal operational team and JV partners to discuss, agree and optimize the logistics process.
- Clearly defined expected outcome
- Key staff involved
- Pre-reads distributed

name: LoggingWOP workshop
description: Prepare and hold Logging Well on Paper (LWOP) meeting with key service companies, operational team and JV partners to agree on final data acquisition (coring and logging) programme.

name: Key Logistics information
description:
Develop overview of key logistic information for the well/project and define;
Contacts and roles and responsibilities
Logistics system
Transportation to installation (equipment/bulk/personnel)
Transportation from installation (equipment/bulk/personnel)

name: DWOP/CWOP workshop
description:
Prepare and hold Drill and/or Complete Well on Paper (DWOP/CWOP) exercise involving key service companies, internal operational team and JV partners to discuss, agree and optimize the operational programme.
- Clearly defined expected outcome
- Key staff involved
- Pre-reads distributed

name: Rig Acceptance Test and Rig Verification
description:
Key Deliverable prior to Operational Readiness Statement. 
Signed off Rig Acceptance Checklists handed over from the Rig Intake team to the Wells Operations team.
Documentation should include conducted tests, verifications, and outstanding actions register at a minimum.

next.name: Long Lead Equipment AFE JV partnership approval

assurance.name: SME Rig intake and Rig projects

name: Rig HSE Plan
description: Yearly rig specific HSE plan that describes Neptune Energies HSE requirements, and the activities that are planned to meet these targets.

name: Site Specific Rig Positioning and Mooring Analysis
description: Develop rig positioning program and mooring analysis

name: Rig Move Meeting
description: Conduct a rig move meeting to review the detailed procedure, logistics support and vessel specifications, risks and mitigations. The meeting should be organized by the drilling contractor and attended by drilling, the logistics teams and the drilling contractor's marine assurance company.

name: End Of Detailed Engineering Phase - Operational Readiness Statement
description: End of Detailed Engineering
